#!/bin/bash -xe
cd /tmp
/usr/bin/wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-7/v7.0.68/bin/apache-tomcat-7.0.68.tar.gz
/bin/tar zxvf apache-tomcat-7.0.68.tar.gz
/bin/mv apache-tomcat-7.0.68 /usr/local/tomcat7
cd /usr/local/tomcat7/webapps
wget https://github.com/udevops42/udevopspuppet/blob/master/modules/tomcat/files/calendar.war
cd /usr/local/tomcat7
./bin/startup.sh
